Description: On I-95 at mile marker 76.3 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 209.5 in the County of Augusta, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 157.2 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 62.4 in the County of Chesterfield, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 276.1 in the City of Norfolk, near 564 Interchange, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage
